login.label: Login
login.min: Login must be at least 5 characters
login.max: Login must be less than 255 characters

username.label: Username
username.regex: Username can only contain letters (A-Z, a-z) and numbers (0-9)
username.min: Username must be at least 5 characters
username.max: Username must be less than 255 characters

email.label: Email
email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters
email.max: Email must be less than 255 characters

firstName.label: First name
firstName.max: First name must be less than 255 characters

lastName.label: Last name
lastName.max: Last name must be less than 255 characters

password.label: Password
password.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.max: Password must be less than 255 characters

passwordConfirm.label: Confirm password
passwordConfirm.min: Password confirmation must be at least 6 characters
passwordConfirm.max: Password confirmation must be less than 255 characters

title.label: Title
title.min: Title must be at least 1 character
title.max: Title must be at must be less than 255 characters

description.label: Description
description.max: Description must be at must be less than 1000 characters

signInDescription: Welcome back! Sign in to access your account and continue your journey with us. Whether you're here to explore, learn, or manage your profile, logging in will give you access to all the features and tools tailored just for you.
signUpDescription: Join our community today! Create an account to unlock exclusive benefits, personalized content, and seamless access to all our services. Signing up is quick, easy, and opens the door to a world of possibilities. Letâ€™s get started!
pageNotFoundDescription: We couldn't find what you're looking for.
